death_place.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总医院

description.zh-cn: 中国空气动力学家、系统科学家，工程控制论创始人之一。曾任美国空军上校，为中美两国的火箭、导弹和航天计划都做出过重大贡献，被誉为“中国航天之父”、“火箭之王”。曾任中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会副主席，位列国家级副职党和国家领导人。
description.en: Chinese aerodynamicist and system scientist, one of the founders of engineering cybernetics. A former colonel in the U.S. Army Air Forces, he made significant contributions to the rocket, missile, and space programs of both China and the United States. He is known as the 'Father of Chinese Aerospace' and 'King of Rocketry'. He served as a Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, holding a national deputy leader position.

description.zh-cn: 钱学森的本科母校。
description.en: Qian Xuesen's undergraduate alma mater.

description.zh-cn: 钱学森获得理学硕士学位的大学，并曾在此任教。
description.en: The university where Qian Xuesen received his Master of Science degree and later taught.

description.zh-cn: 钱学森获得博士学位的大学，并曾在此任教及领导研究中心。
description.en: The university where Qian Xuesen received his Ph.D., taught, and directed a research center.

description.zh-cn: 匈牙利裔美国工程师和物理学家，钱学森在加州理工学院的博士导师。
description.en: Hungarian-American engineer and physicist, who was Qian Xuesen's doctoral advisor at Caltech.

description.zh-cn: 中国物理学家，钱学森在加州理工学院指导的博士生。
description.en: Chinese physicist, who was Qian Xuesen's doctoral student at Caltech.

description.zh-cn: 中国声乐家，钱学森的夫人。
description.en: Chinese vocalist, wife of Qian Xuesen.

description.zh-cn: 钱学森之子，高级工程师。
description.en: Son of Qian Xuesen, a senior engineer.

description.zh-cn: 位于加州理工学院的美国宇航研发机构，钱学森是其主要创建者之一。
description.en: An American aerospace research and development laboratory at Caltech, of which Qian Xuesen was a major founder.

description.zh-cn: 美国陆军的航空作战部门，钱学森曾在此被授予上校军衔。
description.en: The aerial warfare service component of the United States Army, where Qian Xuesen was granted the rank of Colonel.

description.zh-cn: 1950年代美国的反共政治迫害浪潮，钱学森是其受害者之一。
description.en: A wave of anti-communist political persecution in the United States during the 1950s, of which Qian Xuesen was a victim.

description.zh-cn: 钱学森曾在此留学、工作，后因麦卡锡主义受到迫害并被驱逐出境。
description.en: The country where Qian Xuesen studied and worked, and was later persecuted and deported due to McCarthyism.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国防部第五研究院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国防部第五研究院
en: Fifth Academy of the Ministry of National Defense of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国第一个火箭导弹研制机构，由钱学森作为主要创建者之一并担任首任院长。
description.en: China's first rocket and missile research and development institution, with Qian Xuesen as a major founder and its first director.

nodes.id: 中国科学院力学研究所

zh-cn: 中国科学院力学研究所
en: Institute of Mechanics, Chinese Academy of Sciences

description.zh-cn: 钱学森回国后与钱伟长、郭永怀等共同创建的研究所，并担任首任所长。
description.en: An institute co-founded by Qian Xuesen with Qian Weichang, Guo Yonghuai, and others after his return to China, where he served as the first director.

description.zh-cn: 中国空气动力学家，与钱学森共同创建中国科学院力学研究所。
description.en: Chinese aerodynamicist who co-founded the Institute of Mechanics of the Chinese Academy of Sciences with Qian Xuesen.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在1960至1970年代的核武器与人造卫星工程，钱学森在其中扮演了重要角色。
description.en: The nuclear weapons and artificial satellite program of the People's Republic of China in the 1960s and 1970s, in which Qian Xuesen played a crucial role.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首任国务院总理。他委托钱学森起草导弹研制方案，并在文革期间保护了钱学森。
description.en: The first Premier of the People's Republic of China. He commissioned Qian Xuesen to draft a missile development plan and protected him during the Cultural Revolution.

nodes.id: 建立我国国防航空工业意见书

zh-cn: 建立我国国防航空工业意见书
en: Proposal on Establishing China's National Defense Aviation Industry

description.zh-cn: 由钱学森应周恩来委托起草的导弹研制方案，成为中国导弹工程的指导性文件。
description.en: A missile development plan drafted by Qian Xuesen at the request of Zhou Enlai, which became the guiding document for China's missile program.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党，钱学森于1959年正式加入。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China, which Qian Xuesen formally joined in 1959.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一场政治运动，期间钱学森受到周恩来的保护，但许多科学家受到迫害。
description.en: A political movement in China during which Qian Xuesen was protected by Zhou Enlai, but many scientists were persecuted.

description.zh-cn: 中国冶金和航空材料专家，两弹一星元勋之一，在文化大革命期间被打死。
description.en: A Chinese expert in metallurgy and aerospace materials, one of the 'Two Bombs, One Satellite' meritorious scientists, who was beaten to death during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国气象学和空间物理学家，两弹一星元勋之一，在文化大革命期间被迫害自杀。
description.en: A Chinese meteorologist and space physicist, one of the 'Two Bombs, One Satellite' meritorious scientists, who committed suicide after persecution during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾在“批邓反击右倾翻案风”运动中被钱学森写大字报批判。
description.en: A general in the Chinese People's Liberation Army who was criticized by Qian Xuesen in a big-character poster during the 'Counterattack the Right-Deviationist Reversal-of-Verdicts Trend' movement.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国委员会，钱学森曾任其副主席。
description.en: The national committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, where Qian Xuesen served as a Vice Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 中国的社会政治运动，期间钱学森发表文章论证“亩产万斤”的可能性，对运动产生影响。
description.en: A socio-political movement in China, during which Qian Xuesen published an article arguing for the possibility of '10,000 jin per mu' yields, influencing the movement.

nodes.id: 农业中的力学问题——亩产万斤不是问题

zh-cn: 农业中的力学问题——亩产万斤不是问题
en: The Problem of Mechanics in Agriculture—Yields of 10,000 Jin Per Mu Are Not a Problem

description.zh-cn: 钱学森于大跃进期间发表的文章，从理论上论证了粮食高产的可能性。
description.en: An article published by Qian Xuesen during the Great Leap Forward, theoretically arguing for the possibility of high grain yields.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。据称他因阅读了钱学森的文章而相信“亩产万斤”。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He reportedly came to believe in '10,000 jin per mu' after reading an article by Qian Xuesen.

description.zh-cn: 钱学森师从冯·卡门攻读博士学位。
description.en: Qian Xuesen studied under von Kármán for his doctoral degree.

description.zh-cn: 郑哲敏是钱学森在加州理工学院指导的博士生。
description.en: Zheng Zhemin was Qian Xuesen's doctoral student at Caltech.

description.zh-cn: 钱学森是喷气推进实验室的主要创建者之一。
description.en: Qian Xuesen was one of the major founders of the Jet Propulsion Laboratory.

description.zh-cn: 由于麦卡锡主义盛行，钱学森被美方禁止参加机密工作，并最终被驱逐。
description.en: Due to the prevalence of McCarthyism, Qian Xuesen was banned from participating in classified work by the U.S. and was eventually deported.

description.zh-cn: 美国政府吊销了钱学森的机密工作许可，并将其拘留和软禁长达五年，阻止其回国。
description.en: The U.S. government revoked Qian Xuesen's security clearance, detained and placed him under house arrest for five years, preventing his return to China.

description.en: Qian Xuesen was one of the major founders of the Fifth Academy of the Ministry of National Defense, China's first rocket and missile R&D institution.

description.zh-cn: 钱学森在中华人民共和国的“两弹一星”工程中扮演了重要角色。
description.en: Qian Xuesen played an important role in the 'Two Bombs, One Satellite' program of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，周恩来下令保护钱学森，使其免受冲击。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Zhou Enlai ordered the protection of Qian Xuesen, shielding him from persecution.

description.zh-cn: 在1975年的“批邓反击右倾翻案风”运动中，钱学森发表大字报批判时任上司张爱萍。
description.en: During the 1975 'Counterattack the Right-Deviationist Reversal-of-Verdicts Trend' movement, Qian Xuesen published a big-character poster criticizing his superior at the time, Zhang Aiping.

description.zh-cn: 钱学森应周恩来委托起草了《建立我国国防航空工业意见书》。
description.en: At the request of Zhou Enlai, Qian Xuesen drafted the 'Proposal on Establishing China's National Defense Aviation Industry'.

relationships.source: 农业中的力学问题——亩产万斤不是问题

description.zh-cn: 钱学森发表的文章为大跃进时期的“放卫星”提供了“科学论证”，并影响了最高决策。
description.en: The article published by Qian Xuesen provided a 'scientific argument' for the 'launching satellites' (boasting of exaggerated yields) during the Great Leap Forward and influenced top-level decision-making.

relationships.source: 农业中的力学问题——亩产万斤不是问题

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东曾表示，他是在看了钱学森的文章后才相信亩产万斤是可能的。
description.en: Mao Zedong once stated that he came to believe the possibility of '10,000 jin per mu' yields after reading Qian Xuesen's article.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，姚桐斌被红卫兵用钢管打死。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Yao Tongbin was beaten to death with steel pipes by Red Guards.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，赵九章因受迫害而服安眠药自杀。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Zhao Jiuzhang committed suicide by taking sleeping pills due to persecution.
